headline: ‘Small-Caps Set for Upside’: Goldman Sachs Suggests 2 Small-Cap Stocks for 2026
summary: Let’s talk about small-cap stocks. Though they have largely been swimming under the radar during the past year – as mega-cap giants soaked up funds and headlines – small-caps still offer plenty of avenues for solid portfolio growth. It’s important to note here that the Russell 2000, the benchmark index for small-cap investors, has gained in the mid-teens this year. While that slightly lags the S&P 500 (an 18% gain for 2025), it’s nothing to scoff at. Covering the small-cap companies, the Goldman
